cause.description:
On Thursday night, the 12th, The Cline's cabin in northwestern Wisconsin exploded at the flick of a light switch. Colin and Ethan are both in stable but critical condition and therefore cannot be visited for about a week at HCMC. Ethan was strong enough and recently had back surgery on Monday night. However the boys' mother passed away as a result of the explosion.
***For a cause it is required to give a beneficiary but ALL DONATIONS MAY BE MADE TO ANY U.S. BANK***
If you'd like to visit Ethan Email Troy at rockandrot@gmail.com or msg me, his dad asked him to arrange visiting times
Please check caringbridge.org for updates! (go to visit, type ethancline or colincline following the "/")
1. We must help this family after all they have been through.
cause.mission: To Raise Money To Help The Cline's
